statements: UPDATE QuantumPrograms SET program_name = 'Teleportation Program', quantum_structure = '{"qubits": ["qubit1", "qubit2"], "operations": ["Hadamard", "CNOT"]}', logical_representation = '{"input": "qubit1", "output": "qubit2"}' WHERE id = 1;

UPDATE QuantumPrograms SET logical_representation = '{"input": "qubit2", "output": "qubit3"}', program_name = 'Error Correction Program', quantum_structure = '{"qubits": ["qubit1", "qubit2", "qubit3"], "operations": ["Hadamard", "CNOT", "Toffoli"]}' WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE QuantumPrograms SET program_name='Quantum Bell Test' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE QuantumPrograms SET quantum_structure='{"qubits": 5, "gates": ["H", "CNOT"]}' WHERE id=2;
UPDATE QuantumPrograms SET ProgramName = 'Update Example' WHERE Id = 1;
UPDATE LogicalRepresentations SET Representation = 'Revised Program' WHERE ProgramId = 1;
UPDATE QuantumPrograms SET ProgramName = 'New Program' WHERE Id = 1;
UPDATE LogicalRepresentations SET Representation = 'New Representation' WHERE ProgramId = 2;
UPDATE quantum_programs SET program_name = 'Quantum Program 1', program_structure = {'qubits': 3, 'steps': 10} WHERE program_id = 'fbce82c4-2c5b-4b4e-8116-0c1b3367aca8';
UPDATE quantum_gates SET gate_matrix = [[1, 0],[0, 1]] WHERE gate_id = '76594ae2-951f-439d-be6a-081bdbae8326';
UPDATE quantum_programs SET program_name = 'Grover Algorithm' WHERE program_id = '85e997ea-d5b7-4a7f-8c67-b6d8b2588e17';
UPDATE logical_representations SET representation_data = '{"details": "New representation data"}' WHERE representation_id = 'cb6a6e68-4bc7-4f2f-839a-711ff8e243c3';
UPDATE quantum_programs SET author='Alice', creation_date='2022-10-15' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE quantum_gates SET gate_description='Contains quantum logic operations' WHERE gate_name='Hadamard';
UPDATE quantum_programs SET author='Alice', creation_date='2022-09-15' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE quantum_steps SET step_description='Apply Hadamard gate', step_order=2 WHERE program_id=1 AND step_id=3;
UPDATE quantum_programs SET program_name = 'Quantum Computing 101', program_description = 'Introduction to quantum computing' WHERE program_id = 1;
UPDATE quantum_gates SET gate_description = 'This gate represents a 2-qubit CNOT gate' WHERE gate_id = 3;
UPDATE quantum_programs SET program_description = 'Updated program description' WHERE program_id = 1;
UPDATE quantum_gates SET gate_matrix = '{"X": [[0, 1], [1, 0]], "Y": [[0, -i], [i, 0]], "Z": [[1, 0], [0, -1]]}' WHERE gate_id = 3;
